BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings

Items.Title: Oversight - Worker Safety and the Effects of Climate Change on Labor.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Worker Safety and the Effects of Climate Change on Labor.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Housing and Buildings
A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to the means of egress requirements in certain new buildings
Items.MatterName: The means of egress requirements in certain new buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather
Items.MatterName: Department of health and mental hygiene posting worker guidance for best practices for protecting workers from extreme weather.

Items.Title: Resolution condemning Alden Global Capital cuts and managerial hostility towards unionized Daily News staff and calling on the hedge fund to reach a contract deal with the newspaper’s union.
Items.MatterName: Condemning Alden Global Capital cuts and managerial hostility towards unionized Daily News staff and calling on the hedge fund to reach a contract deal with the newspaper’s union.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, to allow the occupancy of cellars in certain one- and two-family dwellings
Items.MatterName: Allow the occupancy of cellars in certain one- and two-family dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city building code, in relation to requiring construction site safety trainings to include mental health and wellness, suicide risk and prevention, and alcohol and substance-misuse
Items.MatterName: Requiring construction site safety trainings to include mental health and wellness, suicide risk and prevention, and alcohol and substance-misuse.
